subject: Needed solution for this problem.
description_text:
Hello, I just received the product today, and an accident occurred while I
was assembling the Simsonn Plux X to my rig. The throttle head came off,
and I have no idea how to reconnect it. Can you help me with this?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jiraputt Veerakanchanpong,    You can visit a nearby computer store and, using the clutch’s wiring sequence as a reference, have an RJ11 connector re-crimped. This is usually the fastest solution.  If that’s not convenient, we can send you a replacement throttle sensor, which you can simply install to replace the existing one.

Thank you for your fast reply. I know it’s hard to believe, but I live in a suburban area where there are no electric repair shops nearby. Is it possible to send me a replacement throttle sensor? And do I need to pay anything? best regard Sent from Mail for Windows
Hi Jiraputt Veerakanchanpong,  Please provide your contact name, address, phone number, and order number, and I will arrange to send you a new throttle sensor free of charge.

Thank you for a respond I bought a Simsonn Plus X from AliExpress. Is it okay to use the AliExpress Order ID? If okay. Name : Jiraputt Veerakanchanpong Address : 431-0431,Shizuoka-ken,Kosai,Washizu,2511-7, レイくパレス中村 A504, Japan Phone number : (+81)70-9323-8554 Order ID : 1115819564713075 Order time : Sep 10,2025 If you want screenshot from AliExpress too please let me know. Thank you Sent from Mail for Windows
Hi Jiraputt Veerakanchanpong,    After we send the replacement today, we will provide you with the tracking number.
